text: Hini na Mprofeti, khuthaza amakholwa ukuba alwe. Ukuba ngaba kukho abantu abanyanisekileyo abangamashumi amabini phakathi kwenu, baya koyisa amakhulu amabini, ukanti ukuba ngaba kukho abantu abalikhulu phakathi kwenu abanyanisekileyo baya koyisa iwaka labo bangakholwayo ngokuba bangabantu abangenangqiqo
